m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Full text of Christie's New Hampshire economic policy speech Chris Christie New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie, a likely Republican 2016 presidential candidate, gestures during an event at the University of New Hampshire in Manchester, N.H., Tuesday, May 12, 2015. (Charles Krupa/AP) The governor unveiled his proposal for economic growth in the country . Here are the governor's remarks as prepared for delivery: I have returned to New Hampshire today to talk to you about the most important issue facing the country today: fixing the economy and creating jobs.
